biotools.summary: The metabolome-microbiome-metadata correlation analysis platform (3MCor) is a web server for integrative correlation analysis of metabolome and microbiome under the instruction of phenotype and with the consideration of confounders. 3MCor is independent to measurement platforms. Along with integrative correlation analysis of metabolome and microbiome under the instruction of metadata (phenotypes and confounders).
